General.Name: Abcourt Mines Inc.
General.Description: Abcourt Mines Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and exploitation of gold mining properties in Canada. It also explores for silver and zinc deposits. Abcourt Mines Inc. was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Rouyn-Noranda, Canada.
General.Address: 475 de lEglise Avenue, Rouyn-Noranda, QC, Canada, J0Z 1Y1
